result.markdown:
---
title: "Exam 2 Review"
subtitle: "Suggested answers"
---




1.  Greg borrows \$1,000 from a bank at an annual interest rate of 5.5%. He plans to pay back the loan in 3 years. How much interest will he pay in total? Remember to use the Banker's Rule.




    ::: {.cell}
    
    ```{.r .cell-code}
    P <- 1000
    r <- 0.055
    t <- 3
    I <- P * r * t
    I
    ```
    
    ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
    
    ```
    [1] 165
    ```
    
    
    :::
    :::




    Greg will pay \$165 in interest. 
2. On March 20, 2025, Sophia plans to invest \$8,990 in a bank account that pays simple interest at an annual rate of 3.09%. How much money would be in this account on Dec 2, 2023? Assume that Sophia makes no withdrawals in between. Remember to use the Banker's Rule.
